page.title: 17My Mum's Hobbies.
page.content: About three years ago my mum and some of her friends started writing about the village. Two people called Brian and Sue came in an Artivan and helped them. They started off writing stories and poems about Woolley Colliery now compared with what it was like in their childhood. Then they learned lots of new things like how to develop films and print photographs. They made a big banner for Mrs. Willey's anniversary.They printed T-shirts and posters, and took their work to several exhibitions. When they were learning how to do screen printing they were filmed for television. Filming was done in school and in our homes and outdoors as well. The completed film was shown on Channel 4 on June 1st. 1985.
